import React from "react"; // import "./WhoWeAre.css"; // Create this file for custom styles import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FaBullseye, FaEye, FaGraduationCap } from "react-icons/fa"; const WhoWeAre = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Who We Are

Get to know the heart of Veritas International Campus

{/* Mission and Vision */}

Our Mission & Vision

To provide a transformative educational experience that empowers students to realize their full potential, prepares them for professional success, and instills values of integrity, responsibility, and compassion

To become a global center of academic excellence, cultivating innovative minds that drive change and contribute meaningfully to society.

{/* Company History */}

Company History

📌 FOUNDED

Veritas International was founded in 2024

📌 FOCUS

Empower Learning, Inspire Growth

📌 HEADQUARTERS

Located in Panadura
{/* Leader Messages */}

Key Messages From Our Leaders

“At Veritas International Campus, our mission is to create a space where education is more than just learning; it’s about molding the leaders of tomorrow who are ready to make a global impact. Our journey started in 2024, with a commitment to providing holistic education that empowers individuals not only academically but personally as well...” Mr. Harshana Gamage
Chairman & Managing Director
harshanamalindu2232@gmail.com
Veritas International Pvt Ltd “Our vision is grounded in creating an institution where students are not just prepared for jobs but for life. At Veritas, we focus on nurturing well-rounded individuals who are equipped with the knowledge, skills, and mindset necessary to succeed in an ever-changing world...” Mrs Jayani Bandara
Chief Executive Officer
jayani.bandara@icloud.com
Veritas International Pvt Ltd
{/* Why Choose Us */}

Why Choose Veritas International Campus?

  • Accredited Programs with global recognition
  • Experienced Faculty who bring expertise and real world insights
  • Holistic Development focusing on academic, professional, and personal growth
  • A vibrant campus in Panadura, close to various cultural and professional hubs
  • A commitment to staying ahead of the curve in an ever evolving educational landscape
); }; export default WhoWeAre;
